ComicInfo.Title: Sodom and Modem Part Two
ComicInfo.Summary:
Special guest artist Steve Dillon (PREACHER, Punisher), concludes a 2-part story! It's all-out action as the FBI finally captures Jeremy Stone. Plus, Grifter battles Agent Orange, an unstoppable mystery-man who may one day become an important component in the WILDCATS' scattered lives.
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-17 15:22:15. [CVDB153342]
